version_description: Welcome to Cytus II
Welcome to Cytus II

Version 1.0.2 update:
1. Fix issue where devices with Apple A6 CPU can't play normally under Grouped Pop-up Mode
2. Improve game performance.

Cytus II v1.1 update

- New character Cherry, contains 10 new songs and new stories. Price: $9.99 USD
(Will continue adding new songs in the future)

- Increase character level limit, adds free unlockable new songs and story content.

- Adjust several game details; optimize and improve the game's performance.

- For iOS devices, adds the devices' corresponding Taptic game feedback function. (Players have the option to turn it off in the Settings page)

Cytus 1.3 update information
- Adds Black Market system; adds 2 brand-new song expansion packs for purchase.
You can now purchase song packs you like in the Black Market. These song packs will add more song content to the existing characters. 
- PAFF / NEKO#ΦωΦ / ROBO_Head character level cap increased; adds more story content.
- Performance optimization and fix some issues.

Cytus 1.4 officially launched

-Introducing the arrival of new character "JOE", delivering 10 new songs of Jazz & Funk, along with additional storyline content for players to purchase

-PAFF, NEKO#ΦωΦ, ROBO_Head level cap extended, featuring more free storyline hints plus 1 new song for players to discover

-Terms of Service updated, players will be prompted to read and agree before entering the game

Cytus 1.5 update information

- Brand-new song pack "Marvelous Mix vol.1", adds 5 new songs for purchase.
- Adds 1 new song to character "ConneR"
- Additional story content
- Fix issue regarding the note size of the "Long Hold" note
- Fix display issue on iPhone X regarding JOE's song illustrations
- Bug fixes

Cytus 1.6 update

- New songs
The five characters (ROBO_Head, Xenon, ConneR, Cherry, JOE) each has one new song.

- Additional story content
Increase level cap for characters. Explore the important plot points in the story.

Cytus 1.7 update information
- Adds new character "Aroma". Through her point of view, players will receive more clues regarding the game's narrative and bring players one step closer to solving the mystery. Players also get to know the backstory of in-game character "PAFF".
- A new share function. By sharing the results screen, players will get a comment for the in-game character regarding their performance.
- More story bits available for existing characters

Cytus 1.8 update information
- Adds new character "Nora". By reading ROBO_Head's archived record files, players are lead further into the story's core. We finally get to unveil the mystery of ROBO_Head's creator: Nora.
- Collaboration with the game "GROOVE COASTER", releases new collab song "FUJIN Rumble". Players can play this new song in the character "NEKO#ΦωΦ ".

Cytus 1.9 update information

● Adds new paid character "Neko"
- New character "Neko" reveals the unknown adventures of the young girl "Neko Asakura" in Node 08 before she took the internet by storm as the streamer "NEKO#ΦωΦ".
- Includes 10 brand-new songs, as well as the very challenging brand-new chart levels

● Major developments to the main plot. The normal, peaceful times in the Node cities will be faced with the massive impact that is "The truth"...

Cytus II 1.9.1

Adds 2 new free song and new Christmas stories.
- The new songs are "Winter Games", included in the character PAFF, and "For You the Bellz Toll", included in the character NEKO#ΦωΦ.

Team Cytus II wishes all players a Merry Christmas.

Cytus II 2.0 major update

** Cytus 7th anniversary update, rich free content added**

- Adds new character "Ivy". Starting from the ruins located deep inside the forbidden area, guides players to unveil the mysterious truth of season 1's main storyline.
- Adds over "12" new songs for free
- Brand-new puzzle-solving elements. Unlock key articles and explore the crucial story bits.
- Adds the BACKUP_DATABASE system. Relive every key incident you encountered during the story's progression.

Cytus 2.1 update
- New songs available for character "Ivy"!
Adds paid song packs "Emotion Samples 01" and "Emotion Samples 02" to the Black Market.

- Additional story!
The story progresses forward, adds more key content that connects to the main story.

- Other bug fixes and performance optimization.

Cytus II ver2.5 release!

- Brand-new free character
New character "Crystal PuNK" is here, contains 6 new free songs.

- New song pack
Song pack "Marvelous Mix vol. 3", contains 5 new songs. Available for purchase in the Black Market.

- Main storyline progression
At the epicenter of chaos and danger, one male and one female take their careful step into the abyss to pursue the traces of destiny and truth.

Cytus II 2.3.9 official release!

- Collaboration with "Hatsune Miku"
Introduces brand-new character "Miku", contains 14 popular songs for players to purchase.

- New Original Story
Saito Entertainment's Diva of the new generation, Hatsune Miku, quickly garnered widespread fame with her glamorous appearance and outstanding performances. Within months after her debut, she has become a household name in Node 03 and touched the hearts of millions of fans worldwide through the virtual internet.
This is a story of her and her love for singing that all begins on the stage.

2.1.1. important update
- Fix issue that caused some Black Market song packs to be unplayable in the game.
Please update this patch in order to ensure that your game can run normally.

Cytus II 2.2 released

- New songs available for character "NEKO#ΦωΦ"!
Adds paid song pack "Game Disc vol.2" to the Black Market.

- Additional story!
The story progresses forward. Through NEKO's point of view, dive deep into the heart of the events. Discover more of the truth behind PAFF's memory. Each character's story gets progress. This complicated web of actions will lead to the next part of Cytus II's story.

Cytus II ver2.3 release

- Adds multiple new free songs!
Character "PAFF" gets "5" new free songs
Character "ConneR" gets "2" new free songs

- Character "PAFF" gets new additional songs!
New IAP song pack in Black Market "Featured Article Vol.1"

- More story!
The story progresses forward. The questions covered in mystery finally starts to get some answers. The hidden pasts of PAFF and ConneR will be revealed.

Cytus II 2.3.1
- Fix errors in UI display and story content

Cytus II 2.3.9 official release!

- Collaboration with "Hatsune Miku"
Introduces brand-new character "Miku", contains 14 popular songs for players to purchase.

- New Original Story
Saito Entertainment's Diva of the new generation, Hatsune Miku, quickly garnered widespread fame with her glamorous appearance and outstanding performances. Within months after her debut, she has become a household name in Node 03 and touched the hearts of millions of fans worldwide through the virtual internet.
This is a story of her and her love for singing that all begins on the stage.

Cytus II ver2.4 release

- Adds multiple new free songs!
A total of 3 new free songs among characters "PAFF", "Xenon" and "ConneR".

- New song packs!
New IAP song packs in Black Market "Memory Unit [A2]" and "Marvelous Mix vol. 2".

- More story!
The story progresses forward. Returning to Node 03, ROBO_Head begins his investigation. The new chapter where the storylines converge is coming soon.

- Other bug fixes and performance optimization.

Cytus II ver2.5 release!

- Brand-new free character
New character "Crystal PuNK" is here, contains 6 new free songs.

- New song pack
Song pack "Marvelous Mix vol. 3", contains 5 new songs. Available for purchase in the Black Market.

- Main storyline progression
At the epicenter of chaos and danger, one male and one female take their careful step into the abyss to pursue the traces of destiny and truth.

Cytus II 2.6 update

- Additional free songs
Character "Xenon" adds 1 new free song

- Brand-new song pack is here
Crystal PuNK character song pack "PuNK EP 01", includes "5" brand-new songs; available in Black Market

- Main Story progression
An endless, pitch-black pool of water, a blue flower waves and withers. Can the truth be found in the land of dreams?

Cytus II Ver 2.7 Release

Happy Halloween!
- Ivy has added a classic Cytushalloween song, "Halloween Party"!

- New free songs
2 new free songs for Xenon added

- New song pack!
New Black Market song pack “Battle CHAOS 2019” added, containing 5 challenging Battle CHAOS 2019 event theme songs for players to purchase.

- The story continues
The story progresses forward. Collect more clues pertaining to the main storyline

The Cytus II 2.8 Update has launched!

- Launches two brand-new paid characters “Sagar” and “Rin”, bringing with them a bunch of exciting songs and a brand-new storyline
An encounter between the captain of A.R.C's Exploration Team and a mysterious researcher uncovers a past that has been buried for ages, recovering a piece of the puzzle that is history which was lost long ago.

- 2 free songs added
“NEKO#ΦωΦ” and “Crystal PuNK” have each added 1 free song

Cytus II 2.8.1 Update Fixes
- Fixed the issue where the Glitch function would not close automatically after leaving the song selection screen, thereby possibly causing the loading bar to get stuck when choosing a character
- Fixed the Immram Brain (HARD) chart issue

The Cytus II 2.8 Update has launched!
- Launches two brand-new paid characters “Sagar” and “Rin”, bringing with them a bunch of exciting songs and a brand-new storyline
An encounter between the captain of A.R.C's Exploration Team and a mysterious researcher uncovers a past that has been buried for ages, recovering a piece of the puzzle that is history which was lost long ago.
- 2 free songs added
“NEKO#ΦωΦ” and “Crystal PuNK” have each added 1 free song

Cytus II 2.8.5 has officially launched!

-Brand-new CAPSO mode is here
Accumulate CAPSOs by playing the game in order to participate in random raffles that'll get you new songs, new charts, new character skins, and various brand-new content!

Cytus 2.9 is now available

- Major progress in the main story

The main characters have headed back to where this all began, and the conclusion to this story is about to unfold. Traveling back and forth amidst the chaos in the OS space and in real life, what will the truth they seek look like?

- 3 free character songs added!
Aroma, Nora, and Neko all add 1 free song

- 2 CAPSO songs added!
Newly added CAPSO rewards, 2 new charts for classic 1st generation Cytus song added

- Paid song pack with 5 songs added!
Paid song pack, "Emotion Samples 03", added to the Black Market, contains 5 new Ivy songs

The chaos expands and the threat moves closer. An evil that has existed for hundreds of years will soon swallow everything…

-Cytus II 3.0-

CVs
-Multiple CVs perform parts of the story
-Sumire Uesaka, Yumiri Hanamori, Tomokazu Seki, and more…

New Character: Vanessa
-New story and over 10 free songs
-3 brand-new free songs (Pure Gummy limited)

Increased Story Speed
-Faster speed for unlocking new songs and story

OS Optimized
-Version No. categories for the story for a smoother OS experience

[Cytus II 3.0.1]
-Fixed the issue where the game crashes after playing for a few minutes
-Fixed the issue where the logic of saving files to the cloud affects progress in the game
-Fixed a few minor bugs
 
 [Cytus II 3.0]
The chaos expands and the threat moves closer. An evil that has existed for hundreds of years will soon swallow everything…
 
CVs
-Multiple CVs perform parts of the story
-Sumire Uesaka, Yumiri Hanamori, Tomokazu Seki, and more…
 
New Character: Vanessa
-New story and over 10 free songs
-3 brand-new free songs (Pure Gummy limited)
 
Increased Story Speed
-Faster speed for unlocking new songs and story
 
OS Optimized
-Version No. categories for the story for a smoother OS experience

Cytus II 3.1 Update

- Collab with maimai DX+ is here!
Launches BM song pack "maimai DX+" and classic songs like "Oshama Scramble!", "Glorious Crown", and more... players can now purchase and play

- Added storyline
Another part of the prologue unveiled; a disastrous experience that was concealed has been brought to light

- Free songs added
Ivy adds 1 free song: "conflict"

- CAPSO rewards added
CAPSO system adds 1 free song: "FREEDOM DiVE"

Cytus 3.1.6 official release!

- Collaboration with "Kizuna AI"
Introduces a brand-new character, Kizuna AI, who brings with her 10 popular Kizuna AI songs for players to purchase.

- New Original Story
The brilliant idol Kizuna AI has been a world-famous superstar for a long time. Fans love her charming singing, dancing, and live performances, whose motivation is simply to  “make everyone happy”. This is a story of how she accidentally stumbled into a meaningful relationship.

Cytus II 3.2 Update

- DJMAX collab songs added!
Launched BM song pack DJMAX Vol.1 with songs BlythE", "OBLIVION", and more... 5 classic songs to purchase and play

- Storyline added
Before the plot twists, drones are losing control at alarming rates and the agitation and restlessness of the people gradually spreads. In the depths of the chaotic data world, in order save it all, she begins taking action…

- Free songs added
Ivy adds 1 free song, "Summer Zephyr"

- CAPSO rewards added
CAPSO system adds Glitch chart to "Hydrangea"

Cytus II 3.3 Update

- DJMAX collab songs added!
Launches BM song pack "DJMAX Vol.2", which has "Nightmare", "U.A.D" and more... 5 classic songs for players to buy and play

- Storyline Added
The situation demands immediate action... sneaking into the underground facility to search for clues is the only remaining option. As the sounds of lamentation reverberate unheard, she clashes with the source of malice…

- Free Song Added
Ivy adds the free song "Sovereign"

- CAPSO Rewards Added
CAPSO system adds Glitch chart for "Re: Boost" and "Perspective"

Cytus II 3.4 

Free Character: Bo Bo
 - Just a simple gift... who would've thought it'd  affect Rin and Sagar's relationship...
Main story adds content

 - Deep memories of falling from great heights and an ethereal opening to the oceans of data. At a loss, Ivy prepares to leave her last record…

5 free songs added
 - Adds 2 Sdorica collab songs
 - Adds 2 main story songs
 - Adds 1 new CAPSO song

New song pack
 - BM song pack "Marvelous Mix vol. 4" includes 5 new songs for purchase

Cytus 3.4.5 is Officially Here!

- DEEMO Collab
Brand-New "Alice" Character has arrived, bringing with her 10 hit classic songs from DEEMO for players to purchase

-Brand New Storyline
A little girl who has lost her name waits for someone, the days passing by without end. In a place where time seems to have stopped, an uninvited guest brings a sliver of hope. The little girl decides to search for something that she's lost…

-Brand-New Exploration Function
Use the OA system to search for hidden storyline clues

Cytus 3.5 is Here!
 
-New CAPSO SHOP! 
Players can collect CAPSO to buy songs, charts, characters, skins, etc. First wave of VOEZ in CAPSO, includes 15 classic VOEZ songs and VOEZ skins

-Crystal PuNK / Bo Bo Stories!
An unexpected call opens KAI's memory, inviting him to revisit the good ol' days...
Sagar fixes his gift and encounters a mysterious bracelet, wrapping Rin and him up in a strange vortex... 
 
-Free Songs!
5 free songs to match the Crystal PuNK & Bo Bo stories
 
-CAPSO Reward! 
New charts added

Cytus II 3.5 is Here!
 
-New CAPSO SHOP! 
Players can collect CAPSO to buy songs, charts, characters, skins, etc. First wave of VOEZ in CAPSO, includes 15 classic VOEZ songs and VOEZ skins

-Crystal PuNK / Bo Bo Stories!
An unexpected call opens KAI's memory, inviting him to revisit the good ol' days...
Sagar fixes his gift and encounters a mysterious bracelet, wrapping Rin and him up in a strange vortex... 
 
-Free Songs!
5 free songs to match the Crystal PuNK & Bo Bo stories
 
-CAPSO Reward! 
New charts added

Cytus II 3.5.5 is Here!

- New DEEMO Collab Story
Fragments of an unknown melody grip a young fellow's heart... The curtain falls and a mysterious guest arrives, unleashing the teenager's desire to search for answers. He enters the endless wastelands... seeking his forgotten past.

- New Character
New Hans character with 10 classic DEEMO songs to purchase

- 7 Years of DEEMO
Alice adds the song "ANiMA"

- Trick or Treat
New CAPSO shop Halloween skins in the Halloween Skin Collection

3.5.6
- Fixed some in-game content
- Fixed some freezing issues and those preventing the game from going full screen

3.5.5
- DEEMO Collab Story
Fragments of an unknown melody grip a young fellow's heart... The curtain falls and a mysterious guest arrives, unleashing the teenager's desire to search for answers. He enters the endless wastelands... seeking his forgotten past.

- New Character
Hans with 10 classic DEEMO songs

- 7 Years of DEEMO
Alice adds "ANiMA"

- Trick or Treat
CAPSO shop Halloween skins

Cytus II 3.6 is Here!

New Storyline
-Uncover more of ROBO's past... nothing gets past "The Eye of Horus".
-Bo Bo forges ahead as Light unveils sinister motives behind The Ender virus.
-5 new free songs

New Character: Graff. J
-1 free, new song and 1 BM Graff. J song pack "Initial G" for players to buy
-Collab songs moved from the NEKO#ΦωΦ song selector to the Graff. J song selector (player records will carry over)
 
CAPSO Update
-New Glitch chart

3.6.1
Fixed an issue where the game may cease to operate after the ending animation plays.

New Storyline
-Uncover more of ROBO's past... nothing gets past "The Eye of Horus".

Cytus II 3.7 is Here! Muse Dash Collab!

- Added 2 free songs: "Lights of Muse" & "Stargazer"

- Launched BM song packs Muse Dash vol.1 & Muse Dash vol.2, with 10 classic songs for purchase

- NEKO#ΦωΦ storyline added; A virtual connection is brought into the real world...

- Bo Bo storyline continues; Light's dark past is gradually unveiled, and the truth... comes to light.

- Free songs
NEKO#ΦωΦ's song selector adds 2 new free songs
Bo Bo's song selector adds 3 new free songs

Cytus II 3.7.1
- Fixed the issue where the game stopped working correctly for some players while in the OA System

Cytus II 3.8 is Here!

New Storyline
- PAFF: The aroma of flowers drifts amid darkness, shining light on intertwining memories...
- Bo Bo: The shocking evil secret behind the Ender virus is finally revealed... 

Free Songs
 - PAFF / Bo Bo add several free songs to match their storylines
 
CAPSO Shop
 - Added VOEZ Collection VI; 3 Classic VOEZ songs for players to purchase 

CAPSO Reward
 - NEKO#ΦωΦ Kimono Skin

New Song Pack 
 -"Marvelous Mix vol. 5" available in the BM for purchase; contains 5 brand-new songs

Cytus II 3.8 is Here!

New Storyline
- PAFF: The aroma of flowers drifts amid darkness, shining light on intertwining memories...
- Bo Bo: The shocking evil secret behind the Ender virus is finally revealed... 

Free Songs

CAPSO Shop

CAPSO Reward

New Song Pack

Cytus II 3.8.5 - Start your engines!

- Outrageous!

- New Song Pack: "Initial G 2nd Stage" brings 5 explosive new songs from Tsuko G; enjoy them while drifting around in your giraffe-mobile!

- Big story updates for Graff. J with new OS storylines that can't be missed

- Slight amendments to story texts to maintain character settings and plot consistency

Cytus II 3.9

New storyline
- Returning to the eve of the human reconstruction project, full details of events during the purge are finally revealed
- Two hands tightly clasped amid the sounds of soft weeping, feeling the last bit of warmth left behind
- The melody recounting the tale from the very beginning is being played for all to hear…

Free songs
- Free songs added for Vanessa / Crystal PuNK to coincide with their new storylines
- Rhuzerv, a new boss song added for Hans

New pack Marvelous Mix vol.6
- 5 songs for players to purchase

New box sales system
- Buy even more song packs for an even better price

3.9.2
 - Bug fix

Go beyond the Ender, to the source that links everything.
　
 ---- Cytus II 4.0 Is Here! ----
　
Free Songs!
 - 5 free new songs added to coincide with Vanessa’s new storyline update
　
New Character - Ilka - Is Here!
 - A forgotten chapter of history buried deep underground, "The Decommission" finally unveiled
 - Includes 10 new songs
　
OS Timeline System Update
 - Use the version/timeline system to sort through OS Logs and experience the stories in a whole new way
　
New Difficulty Chart Added
 - ? difficulty added that excludes score calculations

Cytus II 4.1 is Here!

New song pack Marverlous Mix vol.7 added
- A total of 5 fresh new songs available to purchase including La Prièref, Arklight, Code Interceptor and more

New Crash Chart Added
- Brand-New Devillic Sphere Crash Chart 

New Skins Coming to the The Capso! 
- NEKO#ΦωΦ Summer Swimsuit Skin 
- Ivy Kimono Skin
- Ivy Ængel Skin

Cytus II 4.2 is Here!

New song pack Marverlous Mix vol.8 added
- A total of 5 fresh new songs available to purchase including Exoseven, Phantom, Tokyo Funk and more

Personal Show
- It's show time!

Optimizations
- Bug fixes and performance adjustments

Cytus II 4.2.5 is Here!

 - All-new Kaf collaboration!
 Brand-new character, Kaf, available to purchase along with a collection of 10 of her most popuar songs!

 - Brand-new original storyline
 Kaf, a teenage girl with a truly unique singing voice, decides to completely change her virtual guise after a chance meeting one day. As she performs her songs for those in the real world, she soon gets wrapped up in a mysterious phemonenon that has recently hit the virtual internet. Will Kaf's true identity be revealed to the world against her will?
 This is the story of a young girl spreading her wings as she soars through a boundless ocean.

 - Happy Rayark 10th Anniversary!
 Free commemorative skins for NEKO#ΦωΦ and Xenon available in the CAPSO Shop!

Cytus II 4.3 is Here!

New song pack Marverlous Mix vol.9 added
- A total of 5 new songs available to purchase including Eutopia, TIGER LILY, LIFE is GAME and more

Cytus II 4.4 Is Here!

New collab with CHUNITHM!
- Brand-new BM song pack CHUNITHM containing a total of 5 songs including Climax, SNIPE WHOLE, Trrricksters!! and more now available for players to purchase

Optimizations
- Improvements made to the game save data system

Cytus II 4.4.5 is here!

- All-new Arknights collab brings Amiya to the world of Cytus II!
New character with 10 specially selected songs from the Arknights soundtrack available to buy now!

- Brand-new original storyline
Amidst the cruel, desolate wilderness, stretching far as the eye can see, Amiya leads her comrades on their never-ending quest to protect the Infected from danger. As a sandstorm rages, a chance meeting with a mysterious stranger leads to far more than she could ever have imagined.
Amiya stands firm and ready as the search for a distant shred of hope begins...

Cytus II 4.5 is here!

Dive into the world of DEEMO with the all-new DREAM difficulty level!
- Unlock brand-new charts for Alice/Hans in the OA system

New free songs!
- Graff. J's catalogue has been updated with 2 newly added songs from DEEMO - 'Kaguya' & 'Red Storm Sentiment'

Cytus II 4.5 is here!

Dive into the world of DEEMO with the all-new DREAM difficulty level!
- Unlock brand-new charts for Alice/Hans in the OA system

New free songs!
- Graff. J's catalogue has been updated with 2 newly added songs from DEEMO - 'Kaguya' & 'Red Storm Sentiment'

(Ver 4.5.1) Fixed an issue where certain DREAM difficulty charts were unplayable

Cytus II 4.6 is here!

New story updates
- Ilka's story continues: Steeped in darkness, this endless hunt might just be on the brink of total detonation...

New songs
- Brand-new songs added to coincide with Ilka's story update!

New CAPSO Shop items
- Three classic VOEZ tracks from VOEZ Collection VII as well as Rin's kimono skin now available!

New CAPSO rewards
- New Glitch charts added!

Chart difficulty adjustment
- Slight adjustments to the difficulties of existing charts
